data.title: Inside The Vatican

data.text:
Description

Print version of the January 2015 issue of Inside the Vatican magazine featuring our Top Ten People of 2014. Get the 64-page, full-color magazine with insightful articles and beautiful full sized images to read in the comfort of your home or office.

Learn about Rome, the Vatican, the Pope and stay current on issues of the Church and how they effect your life of faith, hope and charity.

Inside The Vatican (ISSN 1068-8579) is a Catholic news magazine, published monthly except July and September, with occasional special supplements. Subscribe to the print version and you will automatically be able to fully access all articles on the web. This offer is for 10 print magazines per year for one year and full access to the online version of the magazine.

St. Francis Visits New York

“The Primary and indispensable Source…”

People

Carlo Maria Viganò – Archbishop, Nuncio of the Holy See to the United States, Italian

George Pell – Cardinal Prefect of the Vatican Secretariat for the Economy, Australian

Arlindo Gomes Furtado – Bishop of Santiago, Cape Verde, and Cardinal-designate

Duarte da Cunha – General Secretary of the Bishops’ Conferences of Europe, Portugal

Maria Hildingsson – Secretary General of the European Federation of Catholic Family Associations (FAFCE), Sweden

Jaime Lucas Ortega y Alamino – Retired Archbishop and Cardinal of Havana, Cuba

Constantin Sigov – Russian Orthodox intellectual from Kyiv, Ukraine

Eugene and Jacqueline Rivers – Scholar and Protestant minister

Konrad Krajewski – Archbishop, Papal Almoner

Tugdual Derville – Pro-family and pro-life activist in France
